snippet.title: Momogatari - Coming to Kickstarter Trailer
snippet.description:
Momogatari is a 2D Metroidvania with a frantic and fast paced gameplay focused on combat ⚔️

Explore the Yomi world with a sacred weapon that can change sword types. Fight different "Yokai" and challenge the "Kami" of this world, all drawn from Japanese folklore and mythology.


Wishlist On Steam: http://rb.gy/m15lu 
Follow Pre-Kickstarter: http://rb.gy/z31fj
